testcase.name: To test login with different data
testcase.system-out: Given we should be in homepage..............................................passed When Enter the valid name <"user">..........................................passed And Enter valid password <"pwd">............................................passed And click on Login validButton..............................................passed Then I should see name as <"loginName">.....................................passed

testcase.name: To test login with Invalid scenario
testcase.system-out: Given we should be in homepage..............................................passed When Enter the invalid name "Admin123"......................................passed And Enter invalid password "admin123".......................................passed And click on Login invalidButton............................................passed Then I should see the invalid credential as "Invalid credentials"...........passed
